name: Corporate Mole
description:
Play as Hans Moleman as you work to delve deeper and deeper into Worm HQ on a quest of heart-racing espionage.   Aim of the Game: 
  • The aim of the game is to complete all of your ‘Spy tasks’ and get to the elevator to go down deeper to the next level of Worm HQ. 
  • Your ‘suspicion’ level will slowly increase, as well as going up if you get caught committing espionage. 
  •  You must kill any worm that witnesses your illicit acts before they reach the elevator to warn the rest of the company. 
  • If your suspicion is getting high, you can complete ‘Worm tasks’ that are normal, non-espionage worm work (e.g. delivering a package to a bin) to blend in with your worm ‘colleagues’. 
  • If your suspicion reaches 100% or a witness reaches the elevator, your cover will be blown - you lose.
 Controls
  •  WASD to move Hans 
  •  LMB to move camera 
  •  SPACE to attack (*But only attack when necessary, as killing worms will increase your suspicion level and also reduce your score) 
  •  F to interact with certain objects and tasks 
  •  TAB to show/hide your To Do lists
 Credits 

 Joe P. - Gameplay/Design/Some Modelling/Some funny worm sounds 

https://twitter.com/DevFatigued 

 Tom Barden - Loads of fantastic models, advice, game design and Moral Support

https://twitter.com/TomBarden 

 Third party:

 Background Music:  https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/ 

 Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48. 

Cheers for checking it out, hope you enjoy! :)
